titleText: Packers, Microsoft join in $10M tech venture near Lambeau Field

titleText: Microsoft Joins the Home-Speaker Party With Invoke

titleText: Microsoft Releases Visio Online With Stack of Diagramming Templates

titleText: Microsoft’s Market Value Hits a Dot-Com Era Milestone: $600 Billion
mainText: The firm is the third-largest S&P 500 company in market value, trailing Apple (about $800 billion) and Google’s parent company, Alphabet, (about $690 billion). In July, fellow technology and internet stalwarts Facebook and Amazon.com joined.
